creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
provenance: Atelier Vuillard (L. 909c), Paris (in 1840). [E.V. Thaw & Co., New York, after 1950]; [R.M. Light & Co., Santa Barbara, 1950-1971]; Donald Outerbridge, Boston and Santa Barbara (1971-d. 1988); [R.M. Light & Co., Santa Barbara, CA, 1988-2001; sold to Dayton]; Ruth and Bruce B. Dayton, Wayzata (2001; gave to MIA)
title: Self-Portrait
